description: Australia’s financial regulator, ASIC, has issued long-awaited guidance clarifying which crypto assets fall under financial products. The move provides legal certainty for firms but raises concerns about the regulator’s capacity to handle new licensing demands. Under the revised framework, stablecoins, wrapped tokens, and tokenised securities will need authorisation, while Bitcoin and NFTs remain exempt.
title: ASIC Clarifies Crypto Rules; Stablecoins, Tokenised Assets Flagged as Financial Products

description: NASA’s X-59 experimental jet has completed its first flight, demonstrating quiet supersonic technology that could one day allow faster-than-sound travel over populated areas. The test marks a major step toward lifting U.S. restrictions on supersonic flight and could revolutionize commercial aviation.
title: NASA’s X-59 Supersonic Jet Takes Historic First Flight, Paving Way for Quiet Supersonic Travel

description: SpaceX successfully launched 28 Starlink satellites from California’s Vandenberg Space Force Base on October 27, 2025. The Falcon 9 booster B1082 returned safely to the drone ship Of Course I Still Love You after its 17th flight, marking SpaceX’s 137th orbital mission this year and advancing its growing Starlink broadband network.
title: SpaceX Launches 28 Starlink Satellites, Lands Falcon 9 Booster in Pacific

description: Adobe has partnered with Google Cloud to integrate its advanced AI models, including Gemini, Imagen, and Veo, across flagship tools like Photoshop, Firefly, and Premiere. The deal extends to enterprises via Google’s Vertex AI, enabling on-brand content generation. The collaboration also includes a joint go-to-market strategy targeting global creators and businesses.
title: Adobe Partners With Google Cloud to Integrate Frontier AI Models Across Its Platforms

description: Anjali Sivaraman stars in Bad Girl, a coming-of-age Tamil drama that questions societal labels and celebrates individuality. Directed by Varsha Bharath and co-produced by Vetrimaaran and Anurag Kashyap, the film is now streaming on Disney+ Hotstar. With strong performances and emotional depth, Bad Girl delivers a thought-provoking cinematic experience.
title: Bad Girl OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Tamil Drama Online?

description: France’s lawmakers are set to debate a motion that seeks to block the European Central Bank’s digital euro proposal and create a national Bitcoin reserve. The initiative, led by Éric Ciotti and UDR members, aims to safeguard privacy, encourage euro-pegged stablecoins, and tighten oversight under MiCA regulations.
title: French Lawmakers to Review Proposal to Ban CBDC, Support Bitcoin Reserve and Crypto Oversight

description: Grey’s Anatomy Season 22 has now landed on the digital screens. The series explores the aftermath of the OR Explosion and continues from the point where Season 21 ended.
title: Grey’s Anatomy Season 22 OTT Release: Know Where to Watch it Online?

description: Ideabaaz brings new investors, titans, and founders from tier 2 and 3 cities. The show will be streaming on ZEE5 and ZEE TV, respectively.
title: Ideabaaz Now Streaming on ZEE5: Everything You Need to Know

description: Idli Kadai is a Tamil drama movie that stars Dhanush in the lead role. It is releasing soon on Netflix and will be available in multiple languages.
title: Idli Kadai, Starring Dhanush, Now Streaming on Netflix: What You Need to Know

description: M3GAN 2.0 is a sci-fi drama directed and written by Gerard Johnstone, now streaming on Peacock Hub, Jio Hotstar.
title: M3GAN 2.0 Now Streaming on JioHotstar: Here’s Everything You Should Know

description: OnePlus 15 India launch date has been announced. The phone will launch in the country on November 13. The handset was unveiled in China on October 27. In India, the flagship OnePlus smartphone will be sold via the company's online store and Amazon. Recently, the company revealed that the Indian variant will be powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset. Unlike its Chinese counterpart, which runs on Android 16-based ColorOS 16, in India, the OnePlus 15 will ship with OxygenOS 16, which is also based on Android 16.
title: OnePlus 15 India Launch Date Announced; to Debut as First Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 Phone in India

description: Rangbaaz: The Bihar Chapter is an upcoming crime thriller series that is set to hit the digital screens soon. It revolves around the life of a real-life gangster turned politician named Mohammad Shahabuddin.
title: Rangbaaz: The Bihar Chapter OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Crime Thriller Movie Online?

description: Samsung announced Digital Car Key support in India for Mahindra's XEV 9e and BE 6 electric SUVs. Soon, owners of these vehicles will be able to lock, unlock, and start their car with just their Galaxy smartphones.  The Galaxy S series and Z series smartphones launched after 2020 are eligible for keyless entry and ignition.
title: Samsung Wallet Adds Digital Car Key Support for Mahindra EVs in India: 5 Things to Know

description: The Vivo X300 and X300 Pro are expected to launch globally in a single 16GB + 512GB variant, priced at CZK 26,990 (around Rs. 1,13,890) and CZK 34,990 (around Rs. 1,47,650), respectively. Both will reportedly feature smaller batteries, 5,360mAh and 5,440mAh, than their Chinese counterparts but retain IP68 durability and 1,200-cycle longevity. The Indian models are also expected to debut with smaller batteries and the Zeiss Telephoto Extender Kit.
title: Vivo X300, Vivo X300 Pro Price and Key Specifications Leaked Ahead of Global Launch

description: A new bipartisan bill in the US, called the GUARD Act, seeks to ban AI chatbots for users under 18. It mandates strict age verification and introduces penalties for AI firms whose bots generate sexual or violent content. If passed, it could make popular tools like ChatGPT, Gemini, and Claude inaccessible to teenagers.
title: AI Chatbots Will Be Banned for Teenagers With Mandatory Age Verification, Says Proposed US Law

description: Amazon has launched the Fire TV Stick 4K Select in India at Rs. 5,499. The entry-level 4K device supports HDR10+, runs on the new Vega OS, and features a 1.7GHz quad-core processor for faster performance. It offers Alexa voice control, HDMI with HDCP 2.2 support, and the Fire TV Ambient Experience to display artworks when idle. Available via Amazon, Blinkit, Swiggy Instamart, Zepto, and major retail chains, it provides access to popular streaming platforms and smart home integration.
title: Amazon Fire TV Stick 4K Select Launched in India With Vega OS: Price, Features

description: Microsoft has introduced two new Copilot agents —App Builder and Workflows —for Microsoft 365 Copilot subscribers. App Builder can generate full-fledged apps from simple text prompts, while Workflows automates routine tasks across Outlook, Teams, and SharePoint. Both features are initially limited to Frontier users, expanding soon to more subscribers.
title: Microsoft Introduces New Copilot Agent That Can Build Apps from Text Prompts

description: The Nothing Phone 3a Lite is finally here, and it brings an interesting set of features and specifications. The handset features a 6.7-inch Full HD+ AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate. The device also packs a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Pro processor and runs NothingOS 3.5, based on Android 15. The Nothing Phone 3a Lite also features a 5,000mAh battery with 33W fast charging support. Check out the Nothing Phone 3a Lite first impressions to know more about the device.
title: Nothing Phone 3a Lite First Impressions

description: Nothing Phone 3a Lite, the latest addition to the Phone 3a lineup, launched globally on Wednesday. The phone is powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Pro chipset, paired with 8GB of RAM and up to 256GB of storage. The handset will go on sale today in select markets via the company's online store. It will be offered in Black and White colourways and two storage options. It carries a 5,000mAh battery with 33W wired fast charging support. The handset also features the Glyph Light notification indicator on the rear panel.
title: Nothing Phone 3a Lite Launched With Essential Key, Glyph Light and 5,000mAh Battery: Price, Specifications

description: Visa is planning to expand support for four stablecoins across four blockchains as part of its growing digital asset strategy. The company aims to simplify cross-border settlements and enhance financial efficiency. With more than 130 stablecoin-linked programmes in 40 countries, Visa is positioning itself as a major bridge between traditional finance and blockchain technology.
title: Visa to Add Support for Four Stablecoins Across Four Blockchains as Usage Surges

description: iQOO 15, which succeeded iQOO 13, was recently launched in China. Now, the company is preparing to launch the handset in India, too, on November 26. A dedicated microsite for the handset on Amazon, teasing the design, specifications, and features of the flagship iQOO 15, went live, showing it in a silver colourway. Now, the microsite has been updated to confirm that the iQOO 15 will also be sold in the country in a black colourway. In China, the smartphone is offered in four colour options.
title: iQOO 15 Colourways, Key Specifications Teased Days Ahead of Launch in India

description: Samsung has announced that it will soon introduce a new Digital Car key functionality in its native Wallet app, which will allow Mahindra electric SUV owners to unlock and lock their cars from their Galaxy devices. Owners will no longer need a physical key fob or a key to access their Mahindra SUV. While the company has not revealed the names of the "select vehicles" that will support the features, it will likely be the November 2024-launched Mahindra BE 6 and XEV 9e, which are part of the automotive giant's born electric platform.
title: Samsung Wallet Announces Support for Unlocking Mahindra e-SUV Using Smartphones

description: Apple has unveiled Pico-Banana-400K, a new open-source dataset featuring 4,00,000 real and AI-edited image pairs for training text-based image editing models. Available under a research-only licence, it aims to help developers build better image-editing AIs. The release comes as Apple’s own AI progress appears to have slowed, with its long-promised Siri overhaul still pending.
title: Apple Shares Massive Dataset to Help Researchers Build Nano Banana-Like AI Models

description: In a new inteview, Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella has further suggested that the next generation of Xbox consoles could be closer to a Windows PC. Nadella also said that Xbox games would be on every platform. The next-gen Xbox is believed to be targeting a 2027 launch.
title: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella Suggests Next-Gen Xbox Will Be Windows PC and Console Hybrid

description: OpenAI, as part of its plans to achieve artificial general intelligence (AGI) capabilities, will launch an Automated AI Research tool by March 2028. This will be capable of making autonomous scientific discoveries. The company also plans to reduce the time an AI agent takes to generate answers to queries, dubbed test time compute. By September 2026, the AI firm will launch its first Automated AI Research Intern, which is claimed to make the research process faster. On top of this, RazorPay has announced that it is adopting OpenAI's new Agentic Commerce Protocol (ACP) to allow users to make card payments while buying products on ChatGPT.
title: OpenAI Plans to Launch Automated 'AI Researcher' For Autonomous Scientific Discoveries by 2028

description: Oppo has launched the Find X9 series globally, featuring the MediaTek Dimensity 9500 chip, ColorOS 16 and Hasselblad-backed cameras. The lineup, including the Find X9 and Find X9 Pro, will soon debut in India via Flipkart, with colour options like Titanium Grey, Space Black, Silk White, and Titanium Charcoal. Oppo is also bringing the Enco Buds 3 Pro+ and Hasselblad Teleconverter Kit. Launch offers include a Rs. 99 Privilege Pack with exclusive gifts, discounts, and exchange benefits of up to Rs. 18,130.
title: Oppo Find X9, Find X9 Pro Confirmed to Be Available in India via Flipkart

description: Anthropic is reportedly preparing to launch Claude 4.5 Opus, the frontier version of its Claude 4.5 series. A leak suggests the company has shared a new Neptune V6 model with red-teamers for testing jailbreak resistance. The firm is said to be offering bonuses for finding universal jailbreaks, highlighting its ongoing focus on AI safety and robustness.
title: Anthropic Tipped to Release Claude 4.5 Opus Soon, Said to Be Focused on Resisting Jailbreaks

description: Apple is reportedly planning to upgrade the MacBook Air, iPad mini, and iPad Air with premium OLED displays. The OLED display could first arrive in the iPad mini. The iPad mini with OLED panel is said to be in the works with the code name J510. It could come with a price hike of around $100 (roughly Rs. 8,500). Apple reportedly started early development on an OLED-equipped MacBook Air.
title: Apple Said to Plan Upgraded MacBook Air, iPad Mini and iPad Air With OLED Displays

description: Battlefield 6's Season 1 is now live, along with its new free-to-play Battle Royale mode, called Battlefield Redsec. Redsec comes with the largest map in Battlefield history and supports 100 players. EA has detailed the full Season 1 roadmap for Battlefield 6 and for Redsec in a new update.
title: Battlefield Redsec, Battlefield 6's Free Battle Royale Mode, Goes Live Along With Season 1

description: Bitcoin slipped below the $113,000 (roughly Rs. 99.7 lakh) mark on Wednesday as traders turned cautious ahead of the US Federal Reserve’s policy decision. The market saw heavy liquidations, with altcoins showing mixed performance. While some tokens like Pi and Aerodrome Finance posted double-digit gains, others like Ethena and Solana saw declines. Broader sentiment remains cautious, with institutional participation supporting underlying stability.
title: Bitcoin Faces Pressure as Traders Remain Cautious Ahead of Anticipated US Policy Decision

description: OpenAI will reportedly offer all Indian users a free one-year ChatGPT Go subscription starting November 4, 2025, ahead of its first DevDay Exchange event in Bengaluru. Launched in August 2025 as a mid-tier plan at Rs. 399 per month, ChatGPT Go is claimed to provide 10 times higher limits for messages, image generation, and file uploads, along with double the memory capacity. It also includes extended access to GPT-5, Python-based data analysis, longer conversation memory, and tools for projects, tasks, and custom GPTs.
title: ChatGPT Go: All You Need to Know About OpenAI's Plan to Offer One-Year Access to ChatGPT Go for Free in India

description: Google Pixel 10a is rumoured to be in development as the successor to the Pixel 9a. While there are still a few months remaining of its debut, we now have the first glimpse of what it could look like. According to a report, the purported handset will have an unchanged design compared to its predecessor, including a plastic rear panel with a flush camera module. The Pixel 10a is reported to have roughly the same dimensions as the Pixel 9a, too.
title: Google Pixel 10a Renders Reportedly Reveal Unchanged Design; Specifications Tipped

description: Insta360 X4 Air is the latest action camera from the company, which comes with support for video recording in up to 8K 30fps resolution, leveraging dual 1/1.8-inch sensors. There is support for gestures, which allows creators to twist their selfie stick to start capturing content, along with voice commands. The action camera has user-replaceable lenses and an optical coating which protects the sensor against accidental drops.
title: Insta360 X4 Air Launched With 8K Video Recording, Support for Replaceable Lenses: Price, Specifications

description: Moto G67 Power 5G is set to launch in India on November 5 at 12pm IST. The handset will be available for purchase via Flipkart in three Pantone-validated colourways. It is confirmed to come with a 6.7-inch 120Hz screen, a Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 chipset, and a 7,000mAh silicon-carbon battery. The company has confirmed that all cameras on the Moto G67 Power 5G will support 4K video recording.
title: Moto G67 Power to Come With 7,000mAh Battery, 50-Megapixel Sony Camera; India Launch Date Announced

description: OpenAI has finalised its corporate restructuring, officially forming the OpenAI Group Public Benefit Corporation (PBC), which will be overseen by the non-profit OpenAI Foundation. The foundation, now holding equity worth about $130 billion, will direct $25 billion towards healthcare and cybersecurity. Alongside this, Microsoft and OpenAI have redefined their partnership, ensuring flexibility even in the event of achieving AGI.
title: OpenAI Creates Its For-Profit Entity, Signs New Deal With Microsoft Defining AGI Clause

description: Oppo launched the Enco X3s true wireless earbuds alongside the Find X9 series in Barcelona. Priced at SGD 189 (around Rs. 12,900), the earbuds feature dual dynamic drivers tuned by Dynaudio, 55dB active noise cancellation, and Bluetooth 5.4 connectivity with LHDC 5.0 support. They offer up to 11 hours of playback (45 hours with the case), IP55 water and dust resistance, AI-powered call noise reduction, and real-time adaptive ANC. Each earbud weighs 4.73g and has an IP55 dust and water resistance.
title: Oppo Enco X3s Launched With 55dB Active Noise Cancellation, Up to 45 Hours Total Battery Life: Price, Features

description: ColorOS 16 — the new Android 16-based operating system (OS) for Oppo smartphones — was made available to the public with the launch of the Oppo Find X9 series on Tuesday. The company has now announced the release roadmap for the update in global markets. The Oppo Find X8 series, Find N5 foldable, and the Reno 14 series are confirmed to be among the first handsets to receive ColorOS 16, beginning next month.
title: Oppo Find N5, Find X8 Series, and Reno 14 Models to Get ColorOS 16 Update in November: Release Schedule

description: Tata Motors' two consumer-facing platforms, FleetEdge and E-Dukaan, were hacked in 2023 by a cybersecurity researcher, which were reportedly patched by the company in the same year. The flaws gave unauthorised access to bad actors to the platforms' Amazon Web Service (AWS) keys, allowing them to download Tata Motors' files, sensitive customer information, and dealer dashboard. The researcher also managed to log in to the servers as an admin without a password.
title: Tata Motors Reportedly Patched E-Dukaan, FleetEdge Flaws After Researcher Discovered AWS Key Leak

description: The Telecom Regulatory Authority of India (TRAI) on Monday approved a proposal by the Department of Telecommunications (DoT), which mandates the name of the caller to be displayed as the default on the receiver’s phone. The feature, called Calling Name Presentation (CNAP), will leverage the caller’s information registered after verifying their identity during the SIM registration process. It will be a supplementary service offered in association with a basic telecom service.
title: TRAI and DoT Approve Implementation of Feature to Display Caller Names During Incoming Calls

description: YouTube will introduce stricter content rules from November 17 to limit video game footage featuring “graphic violence.” The updated policy, part of efforts to protect younger viewers, expands existing Community Guidelines to cover more forms of violent depictions. It will target scenes showing realistic human characters being tortured or large-scale violence against unarmed civilians. Such videos will be age-restricted, allowing access only to users above 18, as YouTube aims to tighten enforcement around violent gaming content.
title: YouTube to Enforce Stricter Age Restrictions on Violent Gaming Videos, Livestreams

description: The Family Man Season 3, one of the most anticipated web series, is making a comeback this November. Manoj Bajpayee will play the lead role, and the series will explore themes of patriotism, conspiracies, and investigation.
title: The Family Man Season 3 OTT Release Date: When to Watch Manoj Bajpayee’s Spy Thriller Series Online?

description: The Nothing Phone 3a Lite is all set to be launched in India and the global markets today as the latest entry into the Nothing Phone 3 series. It is expected to sit below the Phone 3a as the most affordable handset. Here's all you need to know about the Nothing Phone 3a Lite, including their price in India, expected features and specifications ahead of its launch today.
title: Nothing Phone 3a Lite Launching Today: Know Price in India, Features and Specifications
